credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Nieustajace wakacje [Permanent Vacation]
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description:
The poster is a collage of several layers: 
(1)Sky: photograph of light white clouds, overlaid with single-tone blue, patterned with Ben-Day dots;
(2)Image: profile of an adolescent boy, facing left; image of two skyscrapers at lower left. 
(3)Inscription: running vertically, slightly left-of-center: "NIEUSTAJACE WACACJE", lower right:  "PERMANENT VACATION", and at bottom, list of credits: "scenariusz i rezyseriya: JIM JARMUSCH wykonawcy: CHRIS PARKER, LEILA GASTIL, JOHN LURIE / zdjecia: JAMES A. LEBOVITZ, THOMAS DICILLO muzyka: JIM JARMUSCH, JOHN LURIE".
name: Poster
